name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ad Hider for X.com - Hide Unwanted Ads

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances your browsing experience on X.com by identifying and hiding advertisements within the content feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Ad Blocker for X.com**

This extension enhances your browsing experience on X.com by identifying and hiding advertisements within the content feed. It ensures a cleaner and more focused browsing experience by removing distracting ads.

**Features:**
- Automatically detects and hides ads on X.com
- Improves content visibility by removing unwanted advertisements

**How it Works:**
- The extension scans the content feed on X.com and identifies div elements that contain advertisements.
- These ads are then hidden from view to provide a distraction-free browsing experience.

**Note:** This extension is specifically designed for X.com and is not affiliated with or endorsed by X.com.

**Privacy:**
- The extension does not collect, store, or transmit any user data.
- It operates solely within the X.com domain to modify the appearance of the content feed.
